name: Radiance of the Dawn
effect: radiant AoE 30ft CON save for half damage dc 15 or 2d10+divine damage, dispels magical darkness

name: Sacred Weapon
effect: Add CHA (minimum +1) to weapon attack rolls for 1 min + light + magical weapon

name: Turn Fey
effect: Turn fey and fiends

name: Turn Undead
effect: Turn undead

name: Divine Intervention
effect: Call your deity to intervene directly in the world CHAnce of success equal to Divine

name: Empty Body
effect: Turn invisible

name: Tranquility
effect: 8hr Sanctuary Spell

name: Cloak of Shadows
effect: Turn invisible as an action

name: Maddening Hex
effect: Deal psychic damage to target of hex + nearby creatures

name: Rage
effect: Bonus damage, resistance

name: Hurl Through Hell
effect: On next Hit: banish a target to hell, they return next round and take 10d10 psychic

name: Eldritch Sight
effect: Cast Detect Magic

name: Beast Speech
effect: Cast Speak with Animals

name: Sneak Attack
effect: Bonus damage equal to 1dStealth when you have advantage

name: Fist of Unbroken Air
effect: Bludgeon and push creature 10ft; 1d10 extra damage

name: Quivering Palm
effect: Enemy CON save vs atheltics fail = die succeed = 10d10 damage

name: Whirlwind Attack
effect: Melee attack each creature within 5 ft

name: Flurry of Blows
effect: 2 unarmed bonus attacks

name: Elk Attunement
effect: move 20 ft straight and attack, if you hit, you can knock target prone (one size or less larger than you)

name: War Priest
effect: Make extra weapon attacks as bonus action

name: Thirsting Blade (Blade)
effect: Additional Attack with pact weapon

name: Menacing Attack
effect: Weapon attack +1d8 damage and frighten the target.

name: Stunning Strike
effect: Make unarmed attack, if hit enemy saves vs stun CON vs WIS

name: Divine Smite
effect: Weapon attack +1d8 Radiant Damage on next Hit

name: Polearm Master
effect: Bonus attack with weapon butt 1d4+STR if weilding a polearm

name: Two Weapon Fighting
effect: Weild a weapon in each hand, bonus attack with second weapon

name: Melee Weapon Attack
effect: Make a melee weapon attack.

name: Unarmed Attack
effect: Make an unarmed attack (1 bludgeoning damage + modifiers).

name: Improvised Attack
effect: Use an object as a weapon. DM decides mechanics.

name: Volley
effect: Ranged attack on all creatures in 10-ft radius

name: Throw an Item
effect: Throw an Item

name: Ranged Attack
effect: Make a ranged weapon attack.

name: Throw a weapon
effect: Throw a weapon

name: Fangs of the Fire Snake
effect: unarmed reach attack +10 ft, +con damage to fire, add 1d10 fire to hit

name: Reach Attack
effect: Reach Attack

name: Attack
effect: Make a melee or ranged attack. Includes unarmed strikes or using a weapon.

name: Wild Shape
effect: Transform into beast CR equal to Nature/4

name: Commander's Strike
effect: Use your action to command an ally to make a weapon attack using their action Trigger; they add your 1d(Athletics) to the damage.

name: Vow of Enmity
effect: Gain advantage vs one creature for 1 minute

name: Guided Strike
effect: add +10 to your next hit roll

name: War God's Blessing
effect: Give another creature +10 to next hit roll

name: Versatile Trickster
effect: Use Mage Hand to distract for bonus attack advantage

name: Lunging Attack
effect: Next time you make a melee attack, increase reach by 5 ft and add the 1d(Athletics) to the damage roll.

name: Precision Attack
effect: When you make your next weapon attack, add the 1d(Athletics) to the attack roll.

name: Destructive Wrath
effect: maximize next lightning/thunder damage

name: Divine Sense
effect: Detect celestial, fiend, or undead within 60 ft

name: Lay on Hands
effect: Heal HP or cure diseases/poison

name: Preserve Life
effect: Heal multiple creatures efficiently Divine

name: Healer
effect: Use healer’s kit to restore 1d6+4+HD; stabilize without check.

name: Wholeness of Body
effect: Heal self for hp equal to Survival

name: Cleansing Touch
effect: End one spell on self or ally

name: Rally
effect: Use a bonus action to grant a creature temp HP equal to your CHA mod + 1d(Athletics)

name: Master Transmuter
effect: Use your stone for powerful effects (e.g., restore life, remove conditions)

name: Elder Champion
effect: Advantage on saves, regens 10 HP/round, cast spells as bonus action (1 min)

name: Fiendish Vigor
effect: Cast False Life on yourself

name: Help
effect: Give an ally advantage on an ability check or attack roll against a creature within 5 ft of you.

name: Drink a potion
effect: Drink a potion

name: The Third Eye
effect: Gain 1 of 4 magical senses (darkvision, see invisibility, etc.)

name: Countercharm
effect: Give allies within earshot advantage on savaing throws vs charm or fear effects

name: Stillness of Mind
effect: End Charm/fear with action

name: Blessing of the Trickster
effect: Grant advantage on Stealth checks to an ally

name: Bardic Inspiration
effect: Bonus die to all of allys' rolls equal to 1d(Perform) until your next round

name: Feinting Attack
effect: Use a bonus action to feint; your next attack has advantage and adds the Athletics to damage.

name: Parry
effect: When a creature next damages you with a melee attack, reduce the damage by the 1d(Athletics)

name: Maneuvering Attack
effect: When you next hit a creature, choose an ally who can see/hear you — they can move half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

name: Armor of Shadows
effect: Cast Mage Armor on yourself

name: Eldritch Smite (Blade)
effect: Deal 1d8 force damage and knock prone on next attack

name: Dodge
effect: Until the start of your next turn, all attackers have disadvantage on attacks against you, and you have advantage on Dex saves.

name: Hypnotic Gaze
effect: Charm creature in melee; incapacitate it until harmed - save once: WIS vs Arcane, concentration. Lasts until creature takes damage

name: Abjure Enemy
effect: Frighten one creature (WIS save vs Divine : reduced speed if undead/fiend)

name: Command Undead
effect: Take Control of enemy undead (CHA save vs Arcane)

name: Create Thrall
effect: Charm an incapacitated creature permanently via touch

name: Draconic Presence
effect: frighten/charm aura 60' WIS vs Arcane

name: CHArm Animals and Plants
effect: charm nearby beasts/plants

name: Intimidating Presence
effect: Frighten target WIS vs intimidate

name: Fey Presence
effect: Charm or frighten creatures in 10 ft (WIS save vs Occult)

name: Master of Nature
effect: charmed animals/plants obey one command given now on their turn

name: Menacing Attack
effect: When you hit a creature next, force it to make a WIS save or become frightened until the end of your next turn.

name: Read Thoughts
effect: read surface thoughts + cast Suggestion

name: Dark Delirium
effect: Trap creature in illusory realm (1 min, CHA save vs Occult)

name: Nature’s Wrath
effect: Restrain creature with spectral vines (STR or DEX save vs Nature)

name: Invoke Duplicity
effect: create a flanking illusion

name: Bend Luck
effect: Use add/subtract 1d(Perform) to target creature’s next roll

name: Entropic Ward
effect: Impose disadvantage on an attack ; if it misses, you gain advantage on your next

name: Distracting Strike
effect: When you next hit a creature, you distract it, giving the next attack roll against it advantage before your next turn.

name: Goading Attack
effect: When you next hit a creature, it must make a WIS save or have disadvantage on attacks against targets other than you.

name: Improved Duplicity
effect: Maintain up to 4 duplicates at once

name: Benign Transposition
effect: Teleport self or swap places with a creature

name: Step of the Wind
effect: Disengage as bonus action & Double Jump distance for the turn

name: Shadow Step
effect: Teleport 60 ft from shadow to shadow

name: Evasive Footwork
effect: When you next move on your turn, add 1d(Athletics) to your AC until you stop moving.

name: Cunning Action
effect: Use bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide

name: Pushing Attack
effect: When you next hit a creature, force it to make a STR save or be pushed up to 15 feet away from you.

name: Avenging Angel
effect: Gain wings, frighten enemies, and fly for 1 minute

name: Shield Master
effect: Bonus shove on Attack, add shield to DEX saves, no damage on successful saves.

name: Dash
effect: Move up to your speed again (effectively doubling movement).

name: Disengage
effect: Your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks for the rest of the turn.

name: Stand/Lay down
effect: Stand or go Prone

name: Jump
effect: Jump to a square

name: Grappler
effect: Advantage on attacks vs grappled, can pin enemy.

name: Charger
effect: Bonus action melee/shove after Dash, +5 damage or shove 10 ft.

name: Patient Defense
effect: Dodge as bonus action

name: Riposte
effect: When a creature misses you with a melee attack, use your Trigger to make a melee attack against it and 1d(Athletics) damage.

name: Vanish
effect: Hide as a bonus action; become immune to nonmagical tracking

name: Disarming Attack
effect: When you next hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can force it to make a STR save or drop an item it's holding.

name: Sweeping Attack
effect: When you next hit a creature, attempt to damage another creature within reach by rolling 1d(Athletics) and applying it as damage.

name: Trip Attack
effect: When you next hit a creature, force it to make a STR save or be knocked prone.

name: Hide
effect: Attempt to hide; requires breaking line of sight or finding cover.

name: Draw or sheathe a weapon
effect: Draw or sheathe a weapon

name: Open or close a door
effect: Open or close a door

name: Speak a short sentence
effect: Speak a short sentence

name: Pick up a dropped item
effect: Pick up a dropped item

name: Drop an item
effect: Drop an item

name: Grapple
effect: Special melee attack using Athletics vs target's Athletics or Acrobatics.If successful, target is grappled and can leave

name: Shove
effect: Special melee attack to knock target prone or push them 5 feet.

name: Shield Bash
effect: Shove a creature as a Bonus Action when you attack with an Attack action.

name: Shove to Prone
effect: Shove option to knock a creature prone (contest Athletics vs Acrobatics/Athletics).

name: Spellcasting (Arcane)
effect: Spells starting at 0-level at 4 points in Arcane +2points per next level (INT)

name: Spellcasting (Divine)
effect: Spells starting at 0-level at 4 points in Divine +2points per next level (INT)

name: Spellcasting (Nature)
effect: Spells starting at 0-level at 4 points in Nature +2points per next level (CHA)

name: Spellcasting (Occult)
effect: Spells starting at 0-level at 4 points in Occult +2points per next level (CHA)
